      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putBoolean(boolean b)
      Method used to put a bool into the packet.
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putString(java.lang.String str)
      Method to put a Java String to a byte[] and put it to the packet
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putString(java.lang.String str, int length)
      Method to put a Java String to a byte[] and put it to the packet
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putUnsignedByte(int ubyte)
      Pushes an unsigned byte to the packet Since unsigned bytes can grow up to 2^8-1, and Java bytes can only grow up to 2^7-1 We supply the byte as short.
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putUnsignedByte(short ubyte)
      Pushes an unsigned byte to the packet Since unsigned bytes can grow up to 2^8-1, and Java bytes can only grow up to 2^7-1 We supply the byte as short.
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putUnsignedInteger(long uint)
      Pushes an unsigned integer to the packet Since unsigned integers can grow up to 2^32-1, and Java integers can only grow up to 2^31-1 we supply the integer as long
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.putUnsignedShort(int ushort)
      Pushes an unsigned short to the packet Since unsigned shorts can grow up to 2^16-1, and Java shorts can only grow up to 2^15-1 we supply the short as integer
      PacketWriter PacketWriter.setOffset(int offset)
      Set the offset for this PacketWriter
